_sName: Place Painted NAV File for DE_FASTLINE_V3
_sText:
This is a NAV file for THIS map and as such will only work on it.

As a fan of classical maps I always try to make the experience in the remake as close to the original as possible. The map is a great remake of de_fastline from Condition Zero however the bots didn't use the names of the locations, nor did they show up under the radar, so I new I had to edit the NAV file, to bring the gameplay from CZ into CSS.
Now the bots will mention where they are in radio messages to the player.
Enjoy!
